exp1.name: Progetec - Internship
exp1.description: I worked with C# to change desktop platform of Progetec to Web System. To conclude this project I have to architect the system with DDD, besides that I developed SQLServer code using migrations and ASP.Net Core. The infrastructure was developed with Docker and Google Cloud Platform.
